parameters.description: Filter by folder ID. Use 'root' to get only root-level templates (no folder)
parameters.name: folderId

put.description: Updates a template's metadata. Use folderId="root" to move the template to the root folder.

parameters.description: Template data (folderId can be a folder UUID or 'root' to move to root)
parameters.name: request

post.description: Clones a template using the content from a specific version (identified by versionId in request body). The versionId must belong to the specified templateId.

parameters.description: Clone data (versionId is required and must belong to the template)
parameters.name: request

400.description: Bad request (invalid versionId, version doesn't belong to template, validation error)

put.description: Assigns a document type to a template. If the type is already assigned to another template in the workspace and force=false, returns conflict info. Use force=true to reassign the type (previous template will have its type unassigned).

post.description: Records that the user accessed a tenant or workspace for quick access history

get.description:
Returns the current user's roles. Always includes system role if assigned.
Optionally includes tenant role if X-Tenant-ID header is provided.
Optionally includes workspace role if X-Workspace-ID header is provided.

parameters.description: Tenant ID to check role for
parameters.name: X-Tenant-ID

parameters.description: Workspace ID to check role for
parameters.name: X-Workspace-ID

get.description: Lists tenants where the user is an active member. Supports pagination and optional search by name/code.
get.summary: List my tenants with pagination and optional search

parameters.description: Search query for tenant name or code
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Search query for document type name or code
parameters.name: q

get.summary: List templates by document type code
List workspaces with pagination and optional search

force.description: true = reassign even if type is used by another template

contentStructure.description: Initial content for the first version

force.description: Delete even if templates are assigned

replaceWithId.description: Replace with another type before deleting

templates.description: Templates using this type (if not deleted)

isGlobal.description: True if from SYS tenant (read-only for other tenants)
True if from SYS tenant (read-only for other tenants)

resourceId.description: null for SYSTEM, UUID for TENANT/WORKSPACE

role.description: The specific role (e.g., SUPERADMIN, TENANT_OWNER, ADMIN)

folderId.description: Use "root" to move template to root folder
